BodyName: Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management

Items.Title: Oversight - The Future of the City’s Sanitation Fleet and DSNY’s 2022-2023 Snow Plan.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing penalties on chain businesses for failure to remove snow, ice and dirt from sidewalks
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Increasing penalties on chain businesses for failure to remove snow, ice and dirt from sidewalks.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to exempting or partially exempting seniors and certain persons with disabilities from penalties for failing to remove snow or ice from sidewalks, crosswalks, curbs and other locations
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Exempting or partially exempting seniors and certain persons with disabilities from penalties for failing to remove snow or ice from sidewalks, crosswalks, curbs and other locations.

Items.Title: Oversight - The Future of the City’s Sanitation Fleet and DSNY’s 2022-2023 Snow Plan.
